Name: Alexandre Marcondes
AboutMe:
Business and succesful professionals coach with 18 years of experience on Information Technology. More than 40,000 hours of experience as software developer and more than 1,000 people were taught and trained on lectures and training courses. His vast experience working with distributed teams provided him with contact with co-workers and collaborators on four continents and 35 countries. Alexandre is well known for the quality of his products, lectures and training courses.

Nowadays Alexandre has his focus on technologies such as C#, Mono / Xamarin, HTML5, CSS3 and JavaScript.
